user_profile: User 2487 is an extroverted and socially active male in his 30s, balancing work and leisure with a keen interest in travel and exploration. With a college education and a middle socioeconomic status, he enjoys visiting various points of interest, including airports for travel, gardens for relaxation, and casinos for entertainment. His friendly nature makes him agreeable, building connections with others during his journeys. His conscientious side reflects in his planning for visits to places known for their vibrant live music scenes and trendy dining experiences at hot dog and sausage stalls. Given his focus on leisure and enjoyment, he appears emotionally stable, making the most of each outing. User 2487 has a penchant for new experiences, often seeking out modern accommodations and luxurious stays. He frequents local cafes for a coffee fix and prefers locations that offer both comfort and excitement. Notable POI IDs for future visits may include the Garden (POI id 140) for nature outings and Live Music venues (POI id 2831) for entertainment.
